name: Andhra Pradesh Space Applications Centre - GeoNetwork
description: Andhra Pradesh Space Applications Centre (APSAC) as a nodal agency is committed to excel in providing scientific and technical support to the utmost satisfaction of Users. Adopting state of the art geospatial technologies, playing a pivotal role in supporting Government flagship programmes, and dissemination of geospatial technology to the user community and academia.

geotopics.description: Data related to climatology, meteorology, atmosphere
Data related to environmental monitoring and management
Base maps, earth cover, and imagery data
Data related to agriculture and farming
